content.raw:
Sorry, I thought I only needed to make a few changes but ended up having to make many. In summary:

* Added coverage because codeship runs the same test script for all branches
* Did some hacks to overcome an [upstream](https://github.com/Polymer/web-component-tester/issues/417) issue with wct

Also added the codeship status for the production branch to the [dashboard](#!/osrf/cloudsim/)
content.html:
Sorry, I thought I only needed to make a few changes but ended up having to make many. In summary:

  • Added coverage because codeship runs the same test script for all branches
  • Did some hacks to overcome an upstream issue with wct

Also added the codeship status for the production branch to the dashboard
